Large_Query: Will you allow %ls to join you?Ă
Fondue_Expl_01:
́Merci beaucoup! It felt as 'zo I vas going to be
stuck in zere forever!
ā
Sacre bleu! Look at ze' time! My family iz waiting for me at ze' Wood Park!
ā
If vous do not mind, come and meet me zere. I have somesing to give vous!

Fondue_Expl_04:
́Thank you so much! I'm going to be so late now...
ā
I can't do much for you now, but perhaps you can meet me over at Wood park, yes?
ā
I'll have more time to properly thank you there... So I'll see you then!
Fondue_Open: A Fondude was trapped inside of the stealth box!
Fondue_Pop_01:
́Voila! It is I, Brother %ls! Vas it you!? Vas it vous who saved one of the six Fondude Frères!?
ā
Fondue_Pop_02:
́I am Brother %ls, of the six Fondude Brothers.
You're the one who helped me, aren't you?
ā
Fondue_Pop_03:
́Hello out there... will someone let me out!?
It's me, Brother %ls, one of the six Fondude Brothers.
ā
Fondue_Pop_04:
́Are you the one who helped out Brother %ls, of the six Fondude Brothers?
ā
Fondue_Pop_05:
́Gnarly... I'm free again! The name's Brother %ls,
of the six Fondude Brothers.
ā
Fondue_Expl_02:
́Thank you... now I can finally meet up with the other Fondudes...
ā
Some strange monster stuffed me into that invisible chest, but I'm not sure why.
ā
Oh well! I'd better get going. Come see me over at Wood Park!
Fondue_Expl_03:
́I've been saved! That darned monster grabbed me and stuffed me in there in the middle of my trip...
ā
... Ahh, yes! I was on my way to join the other Fondudes over at Wood Park!
ā
I'm sorry, but I have to hurry over there! Come see me and I'll make it up to you sometime!
Fondue_Expl_05:
́That's the last time I travel alone, that's for sure.
I was on my way to Wood Park, when suddenly...
ā
Some mysterious monster kidnapped me and stuffed me in that stupid box!
ā
I hate to cut this short, since ya saved me... but, let's meet back up at Wood Park.
Fondue_Goodbye: The Fondude ran off in a hurry!
